test_cases.description: Verify that daily wage formula field in leave policy is visually greyed out when payroll-side daily wage calculator override is active; confirm visual indicator communicates the override status
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: Day off to not include salary proration
test_cases.description: Verify Daily Wage Calculator UI allows selection of calculation basis (calendar days vs working days); confirm form accepts configuration for 26 working days standard
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for leap year day inclusion in gratuity formula and service period calculations
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for decimal precision and daily wage formula application in EOS calculations
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Daily Wage Calculator and Leave Policy configuration UIs allow selection of calculation basis (calendar/working/custom days) and salary components
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that unpaid leave deduction remarks display correct number of days for February (29 days for leap year, 28 for non-leap year) instead of 31 days
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that unpaid leave deduction displays daily rate from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month (e.g., April rate when leave occurred in April, not May rate when payroll processed in May)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays show correct temporal context: TSSD-1301 checks February day count accuracy (29 vs 31), TSSD-1807 checks daily rate references leave occurrence month not payroll month. Single test: Navigate to unpaid leave deduction details, verify displayed day count matches actual calendar days and daily rate matches leave occurrence month.
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

screenshot_specifications.test_name: Day off to not include salary proration
screenshot_specifications.description: Verify Daily Wage Calculator UI allows selection of calculation basis (calendar days vs working days); confirm form accepts configuration for 26 working days standard
capture_instructions: Navigate to feature area for: Day off to not include salary proration

screenshot_specifications.description: Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for leap year day inclusion in gratuity formula and service period calculations
capture_instructions: Navigate to feature area for: Gratuity Calculation Leap Year Handling

screenshot_specifications.description: Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for decimal precision and daily wage formula application in EOS calculations

screenshot_specifications.description: Verify unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays show correct temporal context: TSSD-1301 checks February day count accuracy (29 vs 31), TSSD-1807 checks daily rate references leave occurrence month not payroll month. Single test: Navigate to unpaid leave deduction details, verify displayed day count matches actual calendar days and daily rate matches leave occurrence month.
capture_instructions: Navigate to feature area for: Unpaid Leave Display Accuracy

task_flows.flow_name: Access and Configure Daily Wage Calculator
steps: Select calculation type from dropdown (calendar/working/custom days)
Choose salary components to include in calculation
Verify system calculates daily wage based on selected parameters

task_flows.flow_name: Configure End of Service Leave Encashment
steps: Choose salary components (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select calculation method (Calendar Days, Working Days, or Custom Days)
Configure specific leave types for encashment
Choose calculation type (custom days, calendar days, or working days)
If payroll month is open, reject existing prorated transactions
Verify leave policy is set (calendar or working days)
Select calculation type (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Choose salary components to include in calculation
Access End of Service eligibility section
Select End of Service Eligibility policy
Choose salary components (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select calculation method (Calendar Days, Working Days, or Custom Days)
Configure specific leave types for encashment
Choose calculation method (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select day calculation type (calendar days, working days, custom days)
Choose calculation basis (custom days, calendar days, or working days)
If payroll month is open, confirm rejection of existing prorated transactions
Receive unpaid leave request in system
System determines leave policy (calendar or working days)
Verify daily pay rate calculation displays correctly
Confirm payroll deduction appears in payroll table
Verify deduction amount and daily rate are visible
Verify remarks show correct day count and calculation basis

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for leap year day inclusion in gratuity formula and service period calculations
Cannot test via Playwright - requires backend calculation verification for decimal precision and daily wage formula application in EOS calculations
Verify Daily Wage Calculator and Leave Policy configuration UIs allow selection of calculation basis (calendar/working/custom days) and salary components

Verify unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays show correct temporal context: TSSD-1301 checks February day count accuracy (29 vs 31), TSSD-1807 checks daily rate references leave occurrence month not payroll month. Single test: Navigate to unpaid leave deduction details, verify displayed day count matches actual calendar days and daily rate matches leave occurrence month.

not_testable_tickets.reason: Bug is already resolved; no current UI issue to test
Requires verification of backend calculation logic (leap year day counting in gratuity formula); Playwright cannot validate mathematical correctness of calculations

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Requires verification of decimal precision in backend calculations; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of pro-rated amounts
Already resolved; issue was user misunderstanding of expected system behavior, not a UI or testable feature gap

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
